Locations & Drops: {'Shadow Keep , Specimen Storehouse': ['400,000 Runes', 'Remembrance of the Impaler', "Messmer's Kindling"]}
blockquote: Wilt thou be taken in the jaws... of the abbyssal serpent, shorn of light.

name: Promised Consort Radahn
Locations & Drops: {'Enir-Ilim': ['500,000 Runes', 'Remembrance of a God and a Lord']}
blockquote: Now, the vow will be honoured, and my Lord brother's soul will return.

name: Radahn, Consort of Miquella
Locations & Drops: {'Enir-Ilim': ['500,000 Runes', 'Remembrance of a God and a Lord']}
blockquote: Now, the vow will be honoured, and my Lord brother's soul will return.

drops: Remembrance of a God and a Lord

name: Bayle The Dread
Locations & Drops: {'Jagged Peak': ['490000', 'Heart of Bayle']}

name: Godrick the Grafted
Locations & Drops: {'Stormveil Castle': ['20,000 (NG)', '5,000 (NG, Co-op)', "Godrick's Great Rune", 'Remembrance of the Grafted']}
blockquote: I command thee, kneel! I am the lord of all that is golden!

name: Rennala Carian Queen of the Full Moon
Locations & Drops: {'Raya Lucaria Academy': ['40,000 Runes (NG)', '30,000 Runes (NG, Co-op Host)', '10,000 Runes (NG, Co-op Phantom)', 'Other Drops:', 'Remembrance of the Full Moon Queen', 'Great Rune of the Unborn']}
blockquote: Hush, little culver. I'll soon birth thee anew, a sweeting fresh and pure…

drops: Remembrance of the Full Moon Queen

name: Starscourge Radahn
Locations & Drops: {'Redmane Castle': ['70,000', 'Remembrance of the Starscourge', "Radahn's Great Rune"]}
blockquote: The Red Lion General wielded gravitational powers which he learned in Sellia during his younger days. All so he would never have to abandon his beloved but scrawny steed.

name: Morgott The Grace-Given Veiled Monarch Omen King
Locations & Drops: {'Leyndell, Royal Capital': ['120,000', 'Remembrance of the Omen King', "Morgott's Great Rune", 'Talisman Pouch (NG only, Margit not defeated)']}
blockquote: Have it writ upon thy meagre grave: "Felled by King Morgott! Last of all kings."

drops: Talisman Pouch (NG only, Margit not defeated)

name: Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy
Locations & Drops: {'Volcano Manor': ['130.000', "Rykard's Great Rune", 'Remembrance of the Blasphemous']}
blockquote: Join the Serpent King, as family... Together, we will devour the very gods!

name: Mohg, Lord of Blood
Locations & Drops: {'Mohgwyn Palace': ['420,000', "Mohg's Great Rune", 'Remembrance of the Blood Lord']}
blockquote: Welcome, honored guest. To the birthplace of our Dynasty!

name: Malenia, Blade of Miquella
Locations & Drops: {'Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree': ["480,000 Malenia's Great Rune Remembrance of the Rot Goddess"]}
blockquote: ...Heed my words. I am Malenia. Blade of Miquella. And I have never known defeat.

drops: 480,000 Malenia's Great Rune Remembrance of the Rot Goddess

name: Lichdragon Fortissax
Locations & Drops: {'Deeproot Depths': ['90,000', 'Remembrance of the Lichdragon']}
blockquote: After Godwyn the Golden became the Prince of Death, the ancient dragon fought long and hard against the Death within its companion. Alas, victory was never achieved and its only reward was corruption.

name: Maliketh, The Black Blade
Locations & Drops: {'Crumbling Farum Azula': ['220,000', 'Remembrance of the Black Blade']}
blockquote: Cower before Maliketh, Marika’s Black Blade.

name: Astel, Naturalborn of the Void
Locations & Drops: {'Grand Cloister': ['80,000', 'Remembrance of the Naturalborn']}
blockquote: A malformed star born in the lightless void far away. Once destroyed an Eternal City and took away their sky. A falling star of ill omen.

name: Regal Ancestor Spirit
Locations & Drops: {'Nokron, Eternal City': ['24,000', 'Remembrance of the Regal Ancestor']}
blockquote: Ancestral spirits exist as a phenomenon beyond the purview of the Erdtree. Life sprouts from death, as it does from birth. Such is the way of the living.

name: Radagon of the Golden Order
Locations & Drops: {'Stone Platform': ['Elden Throne :', 'N/A']}
blockquote: As the husband of Rennala of Caria, the red-haired Radagon studied sorcery, and as the husband of Queen Marika, he studied incantations. Thus did the hero aspire to be complete.

name: Godfrey, First Elden Lord
Locations & Drops: {'Leyndell, Ashen Capital': ['300,000', 'Remembrance of Hoarah Loux']}

name: Fire Giant
Locations & Drops: {'Flame Peak': ['180,000', 'Remembrance of the Fire Giant']}
blockquote: The Fire Giant is a survivor of the War against the Giants. Upon realizing the flames of their forge would never die, Queen Marika marked him with a curse.

name: Dragonlord Placidusax
Locations & Drops: {'Crumbling Farum Azula': ['280,000', 'Remembrance of the Dragonlord']}
blockquote: The Dragonlord whose seat lies at the heart of the storm beyond time is said to have been Elden Lord in the age before the Erdtree. Once his god was fled, the lord continued to await its return.

Locations & Drops: {'Jagged Peak': ['200,000', 'Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone', 'Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone']}

Locations & Drops: {'Ainsel River': ['12,000', 'Frozen Lightning Spear']}
blockquote: The Dragonkin were born in the Eternal City, where they knew no true sky, nor true lightning. Instead, ice lightning was their weapon.

name: Mad Pumpkin Head
Locations & Drops: {None: ['120,000', 'Blessing of Marika each']}
blockquote: Though he has stifled his panic within the dark confines of his helmet, he rampages as if driven mad when agitated by bloodshed or the humming of insects. This mad soldier is all that is left of a broken gladiator.

name: Erdtree Burial Watchdog
blockquote: The Watchdogs, battered and broken over their lengthy tenure, rule the catacombs and are even said to command the imps.

name: Stonedigger Troll
Locations & Drops: {'Limgrave Tunnels:': ['1,800 Runes (NG)', '450 Runes (NG, Co-op)'], '': ['Roar Medallion'], 'Old Altus Tunnel:': ['9,600 (NG)', '7,200 (NG, Co-op Host)', '2,400 (NG, Co-op Phantom)', 'Other Drops:', 'Great Club']}

name: Beastman of Farum Azula
blockquote: Beastmen from the doomed Farum Azula, the slowly crumbling ruins in the skies. These ruins are said to be the remains of a giant mausoleum enshrining an ancient dragon, guarded by chosen beastmen who wield weapons clad in lightning.

Locations & Drops: {'Coastal Cave': ['1,200', 'Tailoring Tools', 'Sewing Needle']}

name: Ancient Hero of Zamor
Locations & Drops: {'Weeping Evergaol': ['5,400', 'Other Drops', "Radagon's Scarseal"], "Sainted Hero's Grave:": ['24,000 Runes (NG)', '15,000 Runes (NG, Co-op Host)', '5,000 Runes (NG, Co-op Phantom)', 'Other Drops:', 'Ancient Dragon Knight Kristoff Ashes'], "Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave:": ['83,000 Runes (NG)', '62,250 Runes (NG, Co-op Host)', '20,750 Runes (NG, Co-op Phantom)', 'Other Drops:', 'Zamor Curved Sword', 'Zamor Mask', 'Zamor Armor', 'Zamor Bracelets', 'Zamor Legwraps']}

Locations & Drops: {None: ['28,080', 'Malformed Dragon Set']}

name: Crystalian
Locations & Drops: {'Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel:': ['3,000 Runes (NG)', '2,350 Runes (NG, Co-op Host)', '750 Runes (NG, Co-op Phantom)', 'Other Drops:', "Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing (1)"], 'Academy Crystal Cave:': ['3,300 Runes (NG)', '2,465 Runes (NG, Co-op Host)', '835 Runes (NG, Co-op Phantom)', 'Other Drops:', 'Crystal Release'], 'Altus Tunnel:': ['9,000 Runes (NG)', '6750 Runes (NG, Co-op Host)', '2,250 Runes (NG, Co-op Phantom)', 'Other Drops:', "Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (2)"]}
blockquote: The Crystalians are inorganic beings, yet they live. They cleave close to the ideals of the primeval current, and as such, they are revered guests of the sorcerers..

name: Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader
Locations & Drops: {"Ringleader's Evergaol": ['88,000', 'Black Knife Tiche']}
blockquote: The assassins who carried out the deed were scions of the Eternal City. A group entirely of women, arrayed in armour of silver under cloaks which fooled the eye.

name: Grave Warden Duelist
Locations & Drops: {'Murkwater Catacombs:': ['1,700', 'Banished Knight Engvall Ashes'], 'Auriza Side Tomb:': ['15,000', 'Soldjars of Fortune Ashes']}
blockquote: Duelists who were exiled from the colosseum.

name: Cleanrot Knight
Locations & Drops: {'Stillwater Cave': ['2,475 Runes (NG)', '825 Runes (NG, Co-op)', 'Winged Sword Insignia', "Cleanrot Knight's Sword"], 'Abandoned Cave:': ['7,000', 'Gold Scarab']}
blockquote: The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles fiercest of all.

name: Omenkiller
Locations & Drops: {'Village of the Albinaurics': ['4,900', 'Crucible Knot Talisman']}

name: Spiritcaller Snail
Locations & Drops: {"Road's End Catacombs": ['2,250 Runes (NG)', '750 Runes (NG, Co-op)', 'Glintstone Sorcerer Ashes'], "Spiritcaller's Cave:": ['70,000', 'Black Flame Ritual', 'Godskin Swaddling Cloth']}
blockquote: A strange snail-like creature that gives off a pale glow. While weak on their own, they summon forth spirits from beyond to fight on their behalf. But once the snail dies, the spirit will vanish.

name: Ulcerated Tree Spirit
Locations & Drops: {"Fringefolk Hero's Grave": ['15,000', 'Golden Seed', 'Banished Knight Oleg'], 'Stormveil Castle': ['4,736', 'Golden Seed'], 'Minor Erdtree (Mt. Gelmir)': ['18,000', 'Leaden Hardtear', 'Cerulean Hidden Tear'], 'Capital Outskirts': ['8,820', 'Golden Seed'], 'Leyndell Royal Capital': ['9,828', 'Golden Seed'], "Giants' Mountaintop Catacombs:": ['48,000', 'Golden Seed', "Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing [2]"], 'Leyndell\xa0Ashen Capital': ['18,749 each'], 'Belurat, Tower Settlement': ['18,346', 'Immunizing Horn Charm +2'], 'Ellac River': ['18,522', 'Horned Bairn'], 'Church District': ['22,218', 'Iris of Occultation (Rotunda)', 'Mantle of Thorns (Courtyard)']}

name: Full-Grown Fallingstar Beast
Locations & Drops: {'Mt. Gelmir': ['21,000 Runes', '(NG)', '15,750 Runes (NG, Co-op Host)', '5,250 Runes (NG, Co-op Phantom)', 'Other Drops:', 'Somber Smithing Stone [6] 1x', 'Smithing Stone [6] x5', 'Fallingstar Beast Jaw']}

name: Demi-Human Queen Margot
Locations & Drops: {'Volcano Cave': ['11,000', 'Jar Cannon']}

name: Demi-Human Queen Maggie
Locations & Drops: {'Hermit Village': ['13,000', 'Memory Stone', 'Golden Rune [1]']}

name: Onyx Lord
Locations & Drops: {'Royal Grave Evergaol': ['3,600', 'Meteorite'], 'Sealed Tunnel': ['16,000', "Onyx Lord's Greatsword"]}
blockquote: A race of ancients with skin of stone who were said to have risen to life when a meteor struck long ago. They were called lords in reverential fear of their destructive power.

name: Abductor Virgins
Locations & Drops: {'Volcano Manor': ['10,000', "Inquisitor's Girandole"]}

name: Adan, Thief of Fire
Locations & Drops: {"Malefactor's Evergaol": ['3,800', 'Flame of the Fell God']}
blockquote: The monks came to the land of Liurnia in pursuit of a fugitive who stole their fire.

name: Onyx Lord
Locations & Drops: {'Royal Grave Evergaol': ['3,600', 'Meteorite'], 'Sealed Tunnel': ['16,000', "Onyx Lord's Greatsword"]}
blockquote: A race of ancients with skin of stone who were said to have risen to life when a meteor struck long ago. They were called lords in reverential fear of their destructive power.

name: Ancient Dragon Lansseax
Locations & Drops: {'Altus Plateau': ['60,000', "Lansseax's Glaive"]}
blockquote: Lansseax was the sister of Fortissax. It is said that she took the form of a human to commune with the knights as a priestess of the ancient dragon cult.

name: Astel, Stars of Darkness
Locations & Drops: {'Yelough Anix Tunnel': ['120,000', 'Meteorite of Astel']}

name: Battlemage Hugues
Locations & Drops: {'Sellia Evergaol': ['7,800', 'Battlemage Hugues Ashes']}
blockquote: Hugues came from Sellia to study the Haima Conspectus at the academy, where he became a battlemage. Haima scholars seek to quell conflict with cannon fire and the gavel, but Hugues developed a longing for it.

name: Bloodhound Knight
Locations & Drops: {'Lakeside Crystal Cave': ['2,700', 'Cerulean Amber Medallion']}
blockquote: The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made, the knight stays loyal for life.

name: Bols, Carian Knight
Locations & Drops: {"Cuckoo's Evergaol , Liurnia of the Lakes": ['4,600, Greatblade Phalanx']}

LocationsAndDrops.location: Cuckoo's Evergaol , Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Commander O'Neil
Locations & Drops: {'Swamp of Aeonia': ['12,000', "Commander's Standard", 'Unalloyed Gold Needle']}
blockquote: Even after his lord was fled, Commander O'Neil continued to brandish his flag in the devastation of the rot-eaten field of battle, the sole veteran who remembers that battle with pride.

name: Commander Niall
Locations & Drops: {'Castle Sol': ['90,000', "Veteran's Prosthesis"]}
blockquote: Commander Niall, veteran of Castle Sol, offered his prosthesis in exchange for the lives of defeated knights held prisoner. He went on to lead these men as an army of no nation.

name: Crucible Knight Siluria
Locations & Drops: {'Deeproot Depths': ['25,000', "Siluria's Tree"]}

name: Deathbird
Locations & Drops: {"Warmaster's Shack": ['Runes 2,800 (NG)', 'Runes 700 (NG, Co-op)', 'Other Drops:', 'Blue-Feathered Branchsword'], 'Weeping Peninsula:': ['Runes 3,900 (NG)', 'Runes 975 (NG, Co-op)', 'Other Drops:', 'Sacrificial Axe'], 'Scenic Isle:': ['6,600 Runes (NG)', '? Runes (NG, Co-op Host)', '1,650 Runes (NG, Co-op Phantom)', 'Other Drops:', 'Red-Feathered Branchsword'], 'Capital Outskirts:': ['29,000 (NG)', '63,250 Runes (NG+3)', 'Other Drops:', 'Twinbird Kite Shield']}
blockquote: The Deathbirds are graveyard fire keepers; it is said they rake out the ashen remains of the dead from their kilns.

name: Elemer of the Briar
Locations & Drops: {'The Shaded Castle': ['24,000 Runes (NG)', '18,000 Runes (NG, Co-op Host)', '6,000 Runes (NG, Co-op Phantom)', "Marais Executioner's Sword", 'Briar Greatshield']}
blockquote: Elemer of the Briar, the Bell Bearing Hunter, snatched the sword from the site of his looming execution, and furnished it with battle skills from his home of Eochaid

name: Golem
Locations & Drops: {'Stormhill Castle Morne Ainsel River Well Leyndell, Royal Capital Mountaintops of the Giants': ["844 - 3927 Runes Golem's Halberd Golem Greatbow Great Arrow Golem's Great Arrow Golem's Magic Arrow Smithing Stones"]}

LocationsAndDrops.location: Stormhill Castle Morne Ainsel River Well Leyndell, Royal Capital Mountaintops of the Giants
drops: 844 - 3927 Runes Golem's Halberd Golem Greatbow Great Arrow Golem's Great Arrow Golem's Magic Arrow Smithing Stones

name: Fallingstar Beast
Locations & Drops: {'Sellia Crystal Tunnel': ['7,600', "Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (1)", 'Smithing Stone (7) x5', 'Somber Smithing Stone (6)', 'Gravity Stone Chunk x4'], 'Altus Plateau:': ['11,000', 'Somber Smithing Stone (5)', 'Smithing Stone (6) x5', 'Gravity Stone Fan', 'Gravity Stone Chunk'], 'Finger Ruins of Dheo:': ['170,000', 'Gravitational Missile']}

name: Fia's Champions
Locations & Drops: {'Deeproot Depths': ['40,000', "Fia's Mist"]}

name: Flying Dragon Greyll
Locations & Drops: {'Dragonbarrow': ['80,000, Dragon Heart']}

name: Frenzied Duelist
Locations & Drops: {'Gaol Cave': ['6,700', 'Putrid Corpse Ashes']}

name: Glintstone Dragon Smarag
Locations & Drops: {'Liurnia of the Lakes': ['14,000, Dragon Heart']}
blockquote: Smarag was a devourer of sorcerers, and over time, his body became corrupted by their glintstones.

name: God-Devouring Serpent
Locations & Drops: {'Mt. Gelmir': ['Volcano Manor :', '130,000 Runes', "Rykard's Great Rune", 'Remembrance of the Blasphemous']}
blockquote: The great serpent of Mt. Gelmir that swallowed Praetor Rykard. Attacks with poisonous spit, bites, and slams.

name: Godefroy The Grafted
Locations & Drops: {'Golden Lineage Evergaol': ['26,000, Godfrey Icon 78,000, Godfrey Icon (NG+1)']}

name: Godfrey, First Elden Lord (Golden Shade)
Locations & Drops: {'Leyndell, Royal Capital': ['80,000', 'Talisman Pouch (NG Only)']}

name: Godskin Apostle
Locations & Drops: {'Dominula, Windmill Village': ['14,000', 'Godskin Peeler', 'Scouring Black Flame'], 'Divine Tower of Caelid:': ['94,000', 'Godskin Apostle Set']}
blockquote: The apostles, once said to serve Destined Death, are wielders of the god-slaying black flame. But after their defeat by Maliketh, the Black Blade, the source of their power was sealed away.

name: Godskin Noble
Locations & Drops: {'Volcano Manor': ['50,000', "Serpent's Amnion", 'Godskin Stitcher', 'Noble Presence'], 'Divine Tower of Liurnia:': ['4.810', 'Godskin Noble Set']}
blockquote: Nobles are the most ancient apostles who are said to have assimilated inhuman physiology. Not unlike the crucible, the Erdtree in its primordial form.

name: Great Wyrm Theodorix
Locations & Drops: {'Consecrated Snowfield': ['180,000 Runes (NG)', '135,000 Runes (NG, Co-op Host)', '45,000 Runes (NG, Co-op Phantom)', 'Dragon Heart x3']}
blockquote: The name of the ancient troll warrior Theodorix lives on — as a hero of the War against the Giants.

name: Guardian Golem
Locations & Drops: {'Highroad Cave': ['1,700 Runes (NG)', '600 Runes (NG, Co-op)', 'Blue Dancer Charm']}
blockquote: One of the many constructs found across the Lands Between. It wields a large halberd to attack, along with being able to breath fire on anything below it.

name: Kindred of Rot
Locations & Drops: {'Seethewater Cave': ['10,000', "Kindred of Rot's Exultation"]}

name: Lion Guardian
Locations & Drops: {'Stormveil Castle Fort Gael (Caelid) Redmane Castle Castle Sol Leyndell, Royal Capital': ['Stormveil Castle :', '1138 Runes', 'Somber Smithing Stone [1]', 'Beast Blood', 'Old Fang x2']}

LocationsAndDrops.location: Stormveil Castle Fort Gael (Caelid) Redmane Castle Castle Sol Leyndell, Royal Capital

name: Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree
Locations & Drops: {"Miquella's Haligtree": ['200,000', "Loretta's Mastery", "Loretta's War Sickle"]}
blockquote: Loretta, once a royal Carian Knight, went on a journey in search of a haven for Albinaurics, and determined that the Haligtree was their best chance for eventual salvation.

name: Magma Wyrm
Locations & Drops: {'Gael Tunnel': ['7,500', 'Dragon Heart', 'Moonveil'], 'Fort Laiedd:': ['19,000', 'Dragon Heart'], 'Volcano Manor': ['5,044', 'Other Drops:', 'Dragon Heart'], "Dragon's Pit": ['7,718', 'Dragon Heart', 'Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone']}
blockquote: Those who have performed the Dragon Communion will find their humanity slowly slipping away. Once they fully succumb to their fate, they are left no more than wyrms that crawl the earth.

name: Magma Wyrm Makar
Locations & Drops: {'Ruin-Strewn Precipice': ['24,000 Runes (NG)', '6000 Runes (NG, Co-op) Other Drops:', "Magma Wyrm's Scalesword", 'Dragon Heart']}
blockquote: It's said these land-bound dragons were once human heroes who partook in dragon communion, a grave transgression for which they were cursed to crawl the earth upon their bellies, shadows of their former selves.

name: Miranda The Blighted Bloom
Locations & Drops: {'Tombsward Cave': ['Runes 2,100 (NG)', 'Runes 525 (NG, Co-op)', 'Viridian Amber Medallion']}
blockquote: Miranda, maiden of the Flower Crucible is said to have been the very first of this breed.

name: Misbegotten Crusader
Locations & Drops: {'Cave of the Forlorn': ['93,000', 'Golden Order Greatsword']}

name: Misbegotten Warrior
Locations & Drops: {'Unsightly Catacombs': ['Unsightly Catacombs :', '9400 Runes', 'Perfumer Tricia Ashes Redmane Castle :', '16000 Runes', 'Ruins Greatsword']}
blockquote: A Vicious beast that has lost all reason, attacking indiscriminately.

name: Mohg, the Omen
Locations & Drops: {'Subterranean Shunning-Grounds': ['100,000', 'Bloodflame Talons']}
blockquote: The reigning lord and hierarch of the coming dynasty of Mohgwyn. Or perhaps, of a raving lunatic.

name: Necromancer Garris
Locations & Drops: {"Sage's Cave , Altus Plateau": ['9,000', 'Family Heads']}
blockquote: The heads of his flail were made to resemble those of his wife and two children.

name: Nox Swordstress & Nox Monk
Locations & Drops: {'Sellia, Town of Sorcery': ['6,400', 'Nox Flowing Sword']}
blockquote: Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

name: Patches
Locations & Drops: {'Murkwater Cave , Limgrave Liurnia Mt. Gelmir Volcano Manor The Shaded Castle': ['Spared:', '800', 'Golden Rune [1] x2', 'Grovel for Mercy', 'Slain:', 'Spear +7', 'Leather Armor', 'Leather Gloves', 'Leather Boots', "Patches' Bell Bearing"]}
blockquote: Well, well, well? Thought you'd just help yourself to a man's personal belongings?

LocationsAndDrops.location: Murkwater Cave , Limgrave Liurnia Mt. Gelmir Volcano Manor The Shaded Castle

name: Putrid Avatar
Locations & Drops: {'Minor Erdtree (Caelid):': ['9,600', 'Greenburst Crystal Tear', 'Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear'], 'Minor Erdtree (Dragonbarrow):': ['91,000', 'Opaline Hardtear', 'Stonebarb Cracked Tear'], 'Minor Erdtree (Consecrated Snowfield):': ['160,000', 'Ruptured Crystal Tear', 'Thorny Cracked Tear'], 'Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree:': ['27,090', 'Walkway: Rotten Staff', "Gateway: Lord's Rune"]}
blockquote: Guardians of the Minor Erdtrees, infested with Scarlet Rot. Their large staff can knock foes away, and their slam attack releases a cloud of rot, quickly leading to enemies’ demise.

name: Putrid Grave Warden Duelist
Locations & Drops: {'Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs': ['Runes 78,000', 'Runes 58,500 (Coop)', 'Great Grave Glovewort x2', 'Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak']}

name: Putrid Tree Spirit
Locations & Drops: {'War-Dead Catacombs': ['64,000', 'Redmane Knight Ogha Spirit Ashes', 'Golden Seed'], 'Grand Cloister': ['11,193', 'Golden Seed'], 'Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree': ['26,460', 'Golden Seed']}

name: Red Wolf of the Champion
Locations & Drops: {"Gelmir Hero's Grave": ['21,000 Runes', '15,750 Runes (NG, Co-op Host)', '5,250 Runes (NG, Co-op Phantom)', 'Other Drops', 'Bloodhound Knight Floh']}

name: Roundtable Knight Vyke
Locations & Drops: {"Lord Contender's Evergaol": ['21,000 Runes', '15,750 Runes (NG, Co-op Host)', '5,250 Runes (NG, Co-op Phantom)', 'Other Drops', 'Bloodhound Knight Floh']}
blockquote: No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy. Did he make his choice for his maiden, or did some other force lure him with suggestion?

name: Royal Knight Loretta
Locations & Drops: {'Caria Manor': ['7,500 (NG)', '2,500 (NG, Co-op)', "Loretta's Greatbow", "Ash of War: Loretta's Slash"]}

name: Royal Revenant
Locations & Drops: {'Kingsrealm Ruins': ['3,100']}
blockquote: An obscene and disturbing abomination, blend of a spider-like creature and human limbs resulting in a quite resourceful fighter at close range.

name: Sanguine Noble
Locations & Drops: {'Writheblood Ruins': ['8,800']}
blockquote: Known to strike from pools of blood, these assassins are missionaries come to share the gospel of accursed blood.

name: Scaly Misbegotten
Locations & Drops: {'Morne Tunnel': ['2,000', 'Rusted Anchor']}
blockquote: The misbegotten are held to be a punishment for making contact with the Crucible, and from birth they are treated as slaves, or worse.

name: Mimic Tear
Locations & Drops: {'Nokron, Eternal City Hidden Path to the Haligtree': ['Nokron, Eternal City : 10.000 Runes', '33.750 Runes (NG+3)', 'Larval Tear x2', 'Silver Tear Mask Hidden Path to the Haligtree:', '5 0,000 Runes (NG)', '37,500 Runes (NG, Co-op Host)', '12,500 Runes (NG, Co-op Phantom)', '105,000 Runes (NG+1)', 'Blackflame Monk Amon Ashes']}
blockquote: Those of the Eternal City have created a special type of Silver Tear, capable of completely mimicking its opponent, along with any spells, skills and armaments they have.

drops: Silver Tear Mask Hidden Path to the Haligtree:

name: Wormface
Locations & Drops: {'Minor Erdtree (Altus Plateau):': ['10,000', 'Crimsonspill Crystal Tear', 'Speckled Hardtear'], 'Minor Erdtree (Mt. Gelmir):': ['2,937', 'Larval Tear'], 'Crumbling Farum Azula:': ['6,812']}
